document_data.name: Shandar Lyrintar
document_data.mainbody: Lady Joyworker '''Shandar Lyrintar''' was the High Priestess of the [[Hall of Laughter]], a temple devoted to [[Lliira]], in [[Melvaunt]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: Shandar stood {{SI|6|ft|long=yes}} tall and had red hair. She was quite beautiful by most standards and had a lovely singing voice which she used when the Hall of Laughter hosted revelries every fortnight.
document_data.Activities: Shandar oversaw seven other clergy within the temple.
document_data.History: Shandar worshiped in [[Hillsfar]]'s church of Lliira before coming to Melvaunt.
